data.message: Hey Facebook, can you please look into the event, Valentine's punching cat day. Several reports against the page have gotten no response. And I'd like some feedback to this too. It might not be a bad idea to look into who made this page as well.

replies.message: Hi Sharon. Due to the volume of reports we receive, we're unable to reply to every report. Rest assured that we are reading every inquiry we receive. Thank you for taking the time to improve the site. If you've reported something for violating the Facebook Terms, you may have the option to check the status of your report from the Support Dashboard: https://www.facebook.com/help/338745752851127 -Hailey
